description: The 1 back hands the ball to the 2 back, then fake runs to opposite play side. The 2 back takes the handoff and runs to the 7 hole. The 3 and 4 backs make blocks.

rules.name: last_outside
rules.title: Last man outside
rules.description: Block the last man outside, on the playside.

rules.name: destroy_nearest
rules.title: Destroy (Playside)
rules.description: Destroy Playside: Is there anyone Down the playside? (the 'right' part of this call)

rules.name: second_outside
rules.title: Second-to-last man outside
rules.description: Block the second-to-last man outside, on the playside.

rules.name: destroy_nearest
rules.title: Destroy Left (Playside)
rules.description: Destroy Playside: Is there anyone Down the playside? (the 'right' part of this call)

ballCarrier.responsibility:
Take handoff from QB

Secure the ball.

Run to 7 hole.
